Texts.Chs: 请不要让你的家畜们饿肚子，你喂饱了它们，它们才会成长得更快，并且能更快地交配繁殖。
Texts.Eng: The more fed your animals are, the happier they are. They'll mature from babies faster, and (soon)will be more liable to mate and produce offspring.

Texts.Chs: 你得准备一些^orange;家畜饲料^reset;来喂养你的^orange;家畜们^reset;。快把^orange;玉米^reset;放进^orange;研磨机^reset;里吧。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Livestock^reset; grow a whole lot faster when you toss them some ^orange;Cattle Feed^reset; to munch on. ^orange;Grind up corn^reset; in your ^orange;hand mill or extractor^reset; to get some.
